item.title: Vegan Bolognese
item.description: We are starting up with one of my all time favourites: Vegan Bolognese. It is not comparable to an actual one but it resembles a lot of the textures and flavours pretty well and it is a good, quick and easy option to make Spaghetti or Lasagna. It is also way quicker than actual Bolognese, since there is no Meat to add to the flavor profile. Soy sauce and Red wine together with the mushrooms still adding a lot of depth to the dish and helping to give you the umami flavor that you need for a good bolognese.
